Gisborne Speedway set for superstock doubleheader weekend https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-speedway-set-for-superstock-doubleheader-weekend/R4JXLMELEZHA7DMQYZHHVSG6SE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-speedway-set-for-superstock-doubleheader-weekend/R4JXLMELEZHA7DMQYZHHVSG6SE/ Murray Robertson'We’ve got basically the best of the best here': Gisborne Speedway Club president Thu, 12 Dec 2024 01:06:45 +0000 The superstocks field at the MTF Awapuni Speedway are ready to produce plenty of hard-charging and wheel-to-wheel action like this over two nights with the Gisborne charge led by the Rees family. Photo / Liam Clayton
